text.content: Try to have a conversation nearly every evening: just take turns sharing your experiences for the day, without interruption.  No phones, no distractions, just a short conversation.
Talk at least once a day, and show your interest:

content: practicing really understanding what your loved one has to say

text.content: Show your loved one that you’re on their side. If they’re upset or complaining:

content: Find ways to take their side

text.content: Let your loved one know on a regular basis that you are on their team.  Let them know you can take things on together.
Find small ways to show affection with your loved one on a regular basis.  Could be a hand on the shoulder, a hug, a kiss, or anything the two of you feel comfortable sharing.
Send your loved one a text, for no reason other than caring.
